subject: Download protocol for barracks door
body: Good job getting to your email! Here is the download protocol your going to need to unlock the door.

subject: DOWNLOAD THIS
body: You need to download this now!

subject: Extra 50% trade in credit
body: If you come in this weekend you will be able to take advantage of some great offers!

subject: Please Help Me!
body: I am a prince from a real place, I need your help. Please give your bank account information so I Can transfer money to your account!

subject: Latest Equipment Check
body: Just a heads up everyone, there is going to be an equipment check at the end of the week.
